Package com.hexaware.controller

Interface IVirtualArtGalleryController

All Known Implementing Classes:
VirtualArtGalleryControllerImpl
public interface IVirtualArtGalleryController
This interface represents the controller for managing virtual art gallery operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addArtwork()
    Adds a new artwork to the virtual art gallery.
    void
    addArtworkToFavorite()
    Adds an artwork to the favorites of a user.
    void
    getArtworkById()
    Retrieves an artwork by its unique identifier.
    void
    getUserFavoriteArtworks()
    Retrieves the favorite artworks of a user.
    void
    removeArtwork()
    Removes an artwork from the virtual art gallery.
    void
    removeArtworkFromFavorite()
    Removes an artwork from the favorites of a user.
    void
    searchArtworks()
    Searches for artworks in the virtual art gallery.
    void
    updateArtwork()
    Updates an existing artwork in the virtual art gallery.

  • Method Details

    • addArtwork

      void addArtwork()
      Adds a new artwork to the virtual art gallery.

    • updateArtwork

      void updateArtwork()
      Updates an existing artwork in the virtual art gallery.

    • removeArtwork

      void removeArtwork()
      Removes an artwork from the virtual art gallery.

    • getArtworkById

      void getArtworkById()
      Retrieves an artwork by its unique identifier.

    • searchArtworks

      void searchArtworks() throws SQLException, ArtWorkNotFoundException
      Searches for artworks in the virtual art gallery.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
      ArtWorkNotFoundException - if the artwork is not found

    • addArtworkToFavorite

      void addArtworkToFavorite() throws SQLException, UserNotFoundException
      Adds an artwork to the favorites of a user.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found

    • removeArtworkFromFavorite

      void removeArtworkFromFavorite()
      Removes an artwork from the favorites of a user.

    • getUserFavoriteArtworks

      void getUserFavoriteArtworks() throws SQLException, UserNotFoundException
      Retrieves the favorite artworks of a user.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found
